title: Seriously, this is a freaking joke!
body:
I post a picture of a guy who trolled 5 RANKED games in Plat within the last month, and RIOT deletes the thread in seconds, with the following warning to me: 

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Hey Xemeron,

We understand that you want to get word out about this player and their in-game behaviors but this is not the correct avenue to get attention on them. Please continue to use our in-game reporting system to put these players through our behavioral systems.

______________________________________________________________________________________________


Hey RIOT, NEWS FLASH: Since this guy is still playing, your precious report system obviously DOESNT WORK! 
Oh yeah it works against people who flame, who insult, because hey, we all know these people are the real problem (SARCASM), but you seem to strangely  tolerate Trolls.

replies.body: send is a support ticket with the pictures. they don't let you publicize people's stuff on the boards.

> [{quoted}](name=freya od,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=EW9pEHxV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-13T10:13:45.737+0000)
>
> send is a support ticket with the pictures. they don't let you publicize people's stuff on the boards.

Well, since he was trolling and not flaming, that wont do anything.
Hey Xemeron, read the forum rules jackass.
It's naming & shaming. Sending a ticket to Riot Support is highly recommended.
